## Mock.rejectsWithOnce() method

Schedules the mock to reject with value the next time it's called. If anything is already scheduled it will be used first.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rejectsWithOnce(error: any): Mock<ARGS, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | any | error to be thrown. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Mock](./earljs.mock.md)<!-- -->&lt;ARGS, any&gt;
